title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 330-1.9 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 330-1.9 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) There shall be
no fee charged for: (1)
inspection of
records; (2)
search for
records; (3)
any certification
pursuant to this Part. (b) Copies of records shall be provided in
accordance with the following fee schedule: (1)

General documents. (i) Paper prints--$.25 per page up to 9" x
14", or such other fee as is allowed by the Freedom of Information Law, provided, however, that no fee shall be charged for the reproduction of seven
or fewer paper prints up to 9" x 14". (ii)

Plans, drawings, maps: (a) White prints - $.50 per square
foot
(b) Film - $1.50 per square
foot
(c) Aperture cards - $.20
each
(d) Glossy photographs - $1.50
each
(2)

Special documents. (i) Design and
construction contract specifications as specified in the Empire State

Builder. (ii)

Telephone
directory--$2.50 each picked up. $4.50 each prepaid by mail. (iii)

Other publications. Standard pricing
schedule shall remain in effect-- varies from item to item. (3)

Other records. For any other
record not specified herein, the fee to be charged shall be the actual cost of
reproducing the record, except when a different fee is otherwise prescribed by
statute or regulation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
330-1.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
